name: Radial Generator [BETA]
description:
Design radial menus in Figma with Radial Generator.


Tweak and live preview the following radial properties:

  • size
  • number of segments
  • sweep and rotation
  • thickness
  • gap between segments


Radial Generator is currently in an open BETA. Feedback is welcome and appreciated.


Open Source

Radial Generator is open source and contributions are welcome.
